version_description:
With this version, discover Synopsis, our new digital watchface crafted to provide your daily essentials at a glance with up to 6 complications. 
We are also refining Classic to follow the new TAG Heuer Carrera collection and adding chronograph complications!

Practice, edit and share
You can now edit your sport sessions and share them to your friends, family or to your social network. Click on the sharing button on the top of your sport session to discover this new feature.

With this version, discover Synopsis, our new digital watchface crafted to provide your daily essentials at a glance with up to 6 complications. 
We are also refining Classic to follow the new TAG Heuer Carrera collection and adding chronograph complications!

Practice, edit and share
You can now edit your sport sessions and share them to your friends, family or to your social network. Click on the sharing button on the top of your sport session to discover this new feature.

Swim and Run!

Tag Heuer Connected watch now includes a brand new swimming experience and an upgrade of the running experience. The multi-sport app can now be used for pool swimming and indoor running in addition to running, cycling, walking, fitness, and golf. 

TAG Heuer Sport App now makes it possible for pool swimmers to measure and record their performance in the pool using their TAG Heuer Connected watch. On the watch’s touchscreen dial, the swimmer can see metrics for the number of laps completed, total distance, and interval breakdowns. On their smartphone, they can explore additional detailed information such as calories burned, analysis of strokes and pace, and a summary of the entire session.

TAG Heuer is also bringing fresh updates for indoor running activities. Indoor runners will be able to see in which Heart Rate zone they are, at a glance in a dedicated Heart Rate screen. Then at the end of their session, they can input the total distance recorded by the treadmill into the watch which will automatically calculate the Pace of the session.1
